section.title: Conventions
section.para: The OpenStack documentation uses several typesetting conventions:

note.para: This is a note. The information in a note is usually in the form of a handy tip or reminder.

important.para: This is important. The information in an important admonition is something you must be aware of before moving on.

warning.para: This is a warning. The information in warnings is critical. Warnings provide additional information about risk of data loss or security issues.

simplesect.title: Command prompts
simplesect.para: Commands prefixed with the # prompt are to be executed by the root user. These examples can also be executed using the sudo command, if available.
Commands prefixed with the $ prompt can be executed by any user, including root.
